summary: This document is a confidential lieutenant's log and daily activities report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 20, 2019. It appears to be a routine administrative record from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held, created the day before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is a log from the correctional center where he was incarcerated; his presence is implied as the primary high-profile inmate at the facility at that time.

events.title: Daily Operations at MCC
events.description: Routine lieutenant's log and daily activities report generated for the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a confidential lieutenant's log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated July 20, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the MCC at this time; he died in his cell the following day, July 21, 2019.
The log is part of the routine administrative record-keeping of the facility where Epstein was held.
